strings.Value: "Here are the latest reports from our scouts. The Black Marquis who used to take interest in your domain has departed for other lands after our modest... demonstration. It seems we managed to avoid the pirate war! This news is truly great for all of us!"

"{name}, wonderful news! The scouts report that the Black Marquis's blunderheads took an interest in other lands and have left your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}. They'll be someone else's problem now."
